archiefmat.titel: Ingekomen stukken en minuten van uitgaande stukken - algemeen
archiefmat.titel_eng: Incoming documents and final drafts of outgoing documents - in general
archiefmat.scope: Contains correspondence with authorities and private persons in the colony and with the Ministry of Colonies in the Netherlands.
archiefmat.notes: The data presented are based on a draft of the inventory of the archive (December 2008); numbers of the documents may change in the final version. The complete series up to 1957 consists of 16 nos.
